pymagic.gsuite_tools.GDrive¶

class pymagic.gsuite_tools.GDrive[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with Google Drive.

Methods

authorize_credentials

Creates an authorized credentials object for GSuite.

Creates a folder in Google Drive.

download_file

Get all files in a Google Drive.

Uploads files to a folder on Google Drive.
classmethod authorize_credentials()[source]¶

Creates an authorized credentials object for GSuite.

Returns

Authorized credentials object for GSuite

classmethod create_upload_folder(folder_path, parent_id=None)[source]¶

Creates a folder in Google Drive.

Parameters

  • folder_path – Name of folder to create.

  • parent_id – Id of parent folder (optional).

Returns

Created folder information.

classmethod get_all_google_items()[source]¶

Get all files in a Google Drive.

Returns

Pandas DataFrame of files in a Google Drive.

classmethod upload_files(folder_id, upload_filepaths)[source]¶

Uploads files to a folder on Google Drive.

Parameters

  • folder_id – ID of folder to upload files into.

  • upload_filepaths – Filepaths for files to upload.

Returns

Confirmation of files being uploaded.
